Label: Event 1
Value: Stonehenge construction begins. In its first version, it consisted of a circular ditch and bank, with 56 wooden posts.

Label: Event 2
Value: Three Kingdoms period begins in China after the fall of Han Dynasty.

Label: Event 3
Value: Approximate date for the composition of the Iliad and the Odyssey

Label: Event 4
Value: The astrolabe, an ancient tool of navigation, is first used in Europe.
